crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.title: Crystal Config
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.crystalMin: Determines for how many ticks a crystal must have existed until it can get destroyed by a player.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.crystalsAl: Crystals blown up by other explosions will cause explosions too.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.crystalsNe: Brings back 1.12 behavior, where end crystals need two air blocks above to be placed.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.crystalsSm: When placing a crystal only a 1x1x1 box above will be checked for intersecting entities, instead of 1x2x1.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.noAirPlace: Prevents blocks from being placed mid-air.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.bedsStrict: Also performs entity intersection checks on the head parts of beds.
Makes messages green, when they start with '>'
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.noWeaponCo: Brings back click spam pvp, by disabling the weapon cooldown introduced in 1.9.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.noDamageCo: Makes it so you take full damage every time something damages you.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.noAnchorEx: Prevents respawn anchors from exploding, when clicked in the wrong dimension.
crystal-tweaks.midnightconfig.noBedExplo: Prevents beds from exploding, when clicked in the wrong dimension.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.crystal-t: Allows to customize a few crystal pvp related mechanics.
